    • Uses of GroupCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account with parameters of type GroupCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GroupList Account.getGroups(GroupCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the account's assigned groups that match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of GroupCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application with parameters of type GroupCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationAccountStoreMapping Application.addAccountStore(GroupCriteria criteria)
      Convenience method to add a new Group as an AccountStore to this application.
      GroupList Application.getGroups(GroupCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the groups accessible to the application (based on the app's mapped Account stores) that also match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of GroupCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.directory

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.directory with parameters of type GroupCriteria

      Returns a paginated list of the directory's groups that match the specified query criteria.

    • Uses of GroupCriteria in com.stormpath.sdk.group

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.group that return GroupCriteria 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GroupCriteria Groups.criteria()
      Returns a new GroupCriteria instance to use to formulate a Group query.
      GroupCriteria GroupCriteria.orderByDescription()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by group description.
      GroupCriteria GroupCriteria.orderByName()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by group name.
      GroupCriteria GroupCriteria.orderByStatus()
      Ensures that the query results are ordered by group status.
      static GroupCriteria Groups.where(Criterion criterion)
      Creates a new GroupCriteria instance using the specified criterion as the first query condition.
